sect1.title: &zseries;: After a kernel update the system boots into the previous kernel
sect1.para: Installing new kernel version on an &zseries; system does not automatically update the "stage 1" zipl kernel and its initrd. This means, that after a restart the system boots into the old kernel. And if the secure boot is enabled, booting fails when the new kernel is signed with a new signing key.
